view_id.description: The ID for the Google Analytics View you want to fetch data from. This can be found in Google Analytics: https://go.estuary.dev/6utILS

custom_reports.description: A JSON array describing the custom reports you want to sync from GA. Check out the docs to get more information about this field: https://go.estuary.dev/6PgxMK

window_in_days.description: The amount of days each stream slice would consist of beginning from start_date. Bigger the value - faster the fetch. (Min=1, as for a Day; Max=364, as for a Year).
